Linus and Luke react to the new ROG Ally X. Is it really an Xbox? They break down what Microsoft’s “launch platform” approach means, how it compares to other handhelds, and why the real story might be about Windows itself.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JyNRZsnJ1-Y

title: What Even Is An Xbox Anymore?

Linus and Luke share their honest thoughts on Mario Kart World after spending time with it. They talk about the lack of campaign structure, confusing menus, and how the game’s competitive meta can take the fun out of casual play. It’s still great for parties, but not everyone will stick around for the grind.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JyNRZsnJ1-Y
